mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Dr. Sidney Isenberg Collection on Carson McCullers Papers, 1948-1971
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cleckley, Hervey M. (Hervey Milton), 1903-
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cleckley mentions returning a manuscript, a recent meeting with Isenberg and McCullers, and planning a future meeting with both. That manuscript is included here.

There are several files available. There are two PDFs -- one is the letter and one is the manuscript which is mentioned in the letter. Both of the PDFs were created from scans of the original documents and include all pages. There is one JPG image for each page of the original documents.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Friendship
Correspondence
McCullers, Carson, 1917-1967
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from Dr. Hervey Cleckley to Dr. Sidney Isenberg, May 31, 1948 (correspondence)
